thread.title: Remembering Gary Lee Bomar, a Denver Music Scene Original Gone Way Too Soon
thread.title_full: Remembering Gary Lee Bomar, a Denver Music Scene Original Gone Way Too Soon | Westword

author: Michael Roberts
title: Remembering Gary Lee Bomar, a Denver Music Scene Original Gone Way Too Soon
text:
EXPAND Facebook Denver blog posts raise a glass to the people who make this community great.
Related Stories Bet the Local Record Store Named One of America's Best Will Surprise You At our Music blog, Isa Jones shares sad news about the passing of Gary Lee Bomar , owner of Gary Lee's Motor Club and Grub.
Colorado Peak Politics weighs in on John Hickenlooper's decision to take his name out of consideration to be Hillary Clinton's running mate.
Purple Row's Bryan Kilpatrick notes that the Colorado Rockies ended their season with a win â€” a commodity that was in short supply during 2015.
Contact: Michael Roberts Follow: Michael Roberts Westword Westword
